snippet: U.S. Secretary of State John Kerry on Thursday urged countries at U.N. climate talks in Lima to move away from using fossil fuels while demonstrators gathered outside the meeting urged him to reject the Keystone oil pipeline....

headline.print_headline: Kerry Feels Heat on Keystone Oil Pipeline at U.N. Climate Talks
headline.main: Kerry Feels Heat on Keystone Oil Pipeline at U.N. Climate Talks

lead_paragraph: U.S. Secretary of State John Kerry on Thursday urged countries at U.N. climate talks in Lima to move away from using fossil fuels while demonstrators gathered outside the meeting urged him to reject the Keystone oil pipeline.
